# format

**Instance Property**

The format used to create the graphics renderer.

## Declaration

```swift
var format: UIGraphicsRendererFormat { get }
```

## Discussion

The property returns a copy of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRendererFormat] instance used to create the graphics renderer.

## Configuring the renderer

- **allowsImageOutput**: A Boolean value specifying whether the renderer can create output images.

items.description: A Boolean value specifying whether the renderer can create output images.
